analysis: The project appears to be a static website with a focus on Egyptian-themed design elements. The current theme needs improvements to enhance the light color palette, desert-inspired aesthetics, and mobile responsiveness. The existing files include CSS, HTML, and JavaScript, which are UI-related and can be modified according to the constraints.

improvements.description: Update the color scheme to include light desert tones such as sandy beige, soft gold, and pale turquoise to reflect an Egyptian-inspired theme.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon and ensure it is responsive for better usability on mobile devices.
Implement smooth transitions and proper event handling for the mobile menu toggle functionality, ensuring a user-friendly interaction experience.
Fix the SVG data URL to include proper SVG content for Egyptian-themed patterns, such as hieroglyphs or geometric designs.
